page.title: 10Industry-Broughton/Holt
page.content: There is no heavy industry in this rural area but some light industry has been established since the late 1800s. In Broughton on the site of what used to be a sawmill a trading estate has been built and some light industrial workshops established, including a double glazing manufacturer, a commercial printing workshop and an engineering workshop. Nearby in what used to be a mattress manufacturers premises Cannings Seals makes high quality seals for the oil industry and the National Coal Board. Holt being a small town has more industry than Broughton, including a tannery producing chamois leather, a ventilating systems maufacturer and a joinery. The recently developed trading estate has light engineering, specialist frozen foods and self adhesive signs producers.
